banner.heading: Equity Research Analyst Cohort
banner.text: (8 Weeks Cohort With Prasad & Industry Experts)

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 1
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: At the start, we always think that every second stock we find is an excellent opportunity, or some of us realise that we have been missing many opportunities, and both things are not valid. In this section, we start with the basics of investing your first money.

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 2
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: This section is like a handheld support to help you invest your first 10K.
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.alt: Understand how to grow your initial investment

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: How to Invest in Your First Winning IPO
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: Investing in an IPO for listing gain and holding the share for the long term are two different things, and this section deals with both. After this section, you will be able to find such IPOs that give you quick wins in the form of listing gain or can give you a stock to hold on to.

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: 5 Tools to Pick Winning Stocks Faster
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: Here you will learn to do basic financial analysis and ratios to pick fundamentally good stocks for your portfolio which can outperform the index in the long term.

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: Penny Stock ki Duniya
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: How can you find a penny that can be a titan for you?

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: Avoid These 3 Mistakes to Save Lakhs
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: It is essential to know what to do in the stock market, but it is more important to know what NOT to do in the stock market.

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: Psychology of Making Money
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: Making is not an art, nor is it a science. It is a craft. A craft that can be perfected with the right tools, technique, mindset and more. And this section will talk about that.

syllabus_for_foundation_course2.title: Saving Your Stock Taxes
syllabus_for_foundation_course2.subtitle: Do you want to give away your profits from the stock market to anyone? I hope not. This section will talk about the best way to save your capital gain taxes.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 1 - Introduction to Research Analyst
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Understand your role & responsibilities as a research analyst

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 2 - Introduction to Securities Market
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Learn about the securities market and its various aspects in India

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 3 - Terminology in Equity and Debt Markets
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Dive deeper into equity & debt in India

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 4 - Fundamentals of Research
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Learn the what, how & why of research and its relevance to investing
syllabus_for_foundation_course.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 5 - Economic Analysis
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Understand the micro & macro economics and how it works

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 6 - Industry Analysis
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Understand the role of industry analysis in research and investing, and how to perform the same

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 7 - Business and Governance Analysis
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: How management of the company shapes the company’s future

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 8 - Financial Analysis
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Learn to read statements and other numbers of a company
syllabus_for_foundation_course.alt: Buying Gold at The Price of Silver

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 9 - Corporate Actions
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Learn the impact of non-operative actions in a company
syllabus_for_foundation_course.alt: Valuation Hacks to Find Undervalued Gems

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 10 - Valuation Principles
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Find the fair value of a company

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 11 - Fundamentals of Risk and Return
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Understand the risk & return principles with capital conservation and more

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 12 - Qualities of a Good Research Report
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Make reports that aid in decision making

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Chapter 13 - Legal and Regulatory Environment
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Understand the legal structure of investing in India

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 1 - Real Intro to Value Investing
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: This is the Multi-Bagger Secret Framework, which every successful investor uses and this is what we have been using to find stocks for us and our client.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 2 - Implementing Value Investing
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: It is an open truth that small and mid-cap companies suffer from scams, but they have more potential to be a multi-bagger.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 3 - Implementing Growth Investing
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: Stocks that are not in news or media outlets, but have the potential to boost in the near future. We learn to find such companies here.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 4 - Understanding QAAD Strategy
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: Many companies have assets that are more valuable than the company it self. We just need to identify those valuable assets, how? Lets learn it here.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 5 - Implementing QAAD Strategy
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: It’s company management who either makes or breaks the company. Learn how to find the best management who can take the company to the heights of success.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 6 - FinnovationZ’s Proprietary Strategies
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: Learning to bet on the people of the company, not on the company, because a company is nothing but a number of individuals gathered together to solve a problem.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 7 - FinnovationZ’s Duel-lens Framework
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: An underrated part of financial statement, which is seldom used. Cash is the most difficult thing to get manipulated and that's why most trustworthy.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 8 - Implementing SOTP Strategy
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: Learning to use cash flow statements as a tool to get a true picture of any business using ratio analysis and more.
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 9 - Layered Hidden Parts
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: The P&L (Profit and Loss) Statement Analysis chapter centers on the assessment of a company's financial performance over a specific period. It delves into the revenue, expenses, and resulting profit or loss generated by the company's operations.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 10 - Hidden Value Hunting
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: Learning to read between the lines to find the real performance of the company.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 11 - Value Traps & Junks
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: The Balance Sheet Statement Analysis focuses on evaluating a company's financial position at a specific point in time. It examines the company's assets, liabilities, and shareholders' equity, offering insights into its overall financial health and stability.

syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.title: Week 12 - Building Your Stock Portfolio
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.subtitle: It’s better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price, says Warren Buffett. This in itself talks about the importance of value investing in the stock market.
syllabus_for_fundamental_analysis_2.alt: Buying Gold at The Price of Silver

user_testimonials.name: Ankit Singh Hooda

user_testimonials.name: Ganesh vhatkar

user_testimonials.name: Mr. Ankit Verma

user_testimonials.name: Tanuj Rastogi
user_testimonials.comment: We have joined the fundamental course that is really life changing and very easy to understand. Really wonderful

candidate.courseTxt: Those who want make their career in research or do the same for their own

faq.question: Does this course include Fundamental Analysis 1.0?
How this course is different from The Foundation Course On Indian Stock Market (Beginner)?
faq.answer: This course deals with more advanced applications and investment tools whereas the beginner course talks about basic practical applications in the stock market, which is very useful for a beginner. If you want to learn advanced tools and techniques to invest in the stock market you should go for this course.

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or in English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
faq.answer: It is a pre-recorded course with lifetime access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
How to access this course after payment?
faq.answer: After payment you will get a login link and credential on your whatsapp number and mail. There you can access your course.

faq.question: Is this course focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is focused on long term investors.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the course?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice with this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice.

faq.question: Does this course include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: This course is designed for investors and not for traders, hence it doesn't need technical analysis.

faq.question: What skills are needed for fundamental analysis?
faq.answer: You should have knowledge of basic maths with some working knowledge of the stock market.

clientTestimonial.name: Saurabh Kumar Srivastava
clientTestimonial.text: मैं पूरी ईमानदारी से कहना चाहूंगा कि यह फंडामेंटल एनालिसिस का कोर्स मेरे जीवन का सबसे उच्चतम श्रेणी का कोर्स रहा है। इस में मैने कंपनी को गहराई तक एनालिसिस जैसे कि कंपनी के मैनेजमेंट, कैश फ्लो स्टेटमेंट, वैल्यूएशन, प्रोडक्ट एनालिसिस जैसी चीजें बहुत ही आसान तरीके से सिखाई गई वो भी खासकर हिंदी में जोकि हिंदी भाषी लोगों को। मैं प्रसाद सर को और पूरी फाइनोवेशन टीम को इस काम के लिए दिल से धन्यवाद करता हूं।🙏
